FuncDef: The reset rip imported-routes command deletes the routes imported from other RIP processes or protocols and re-imports the routes to RIP.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the RIP process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Importing a large number of routes within a short period of time affects device performance. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
